meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Boyd Susan Baker Paul Mathless Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1051.

td.p: Dave Boyd, a patient unit clerk from Galesburg, Illinois
Susan Baker, a sales manager originally from Illinois
Paul Mathless, an editor from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,300)

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
REFERENCE BOOKS
WICKED WOMEN
SPORTS
ROCK 'N' ROLL FILMS
POTABLE ANAGRAMS

tr.td: This city is situated at the junction of the Anacostia & Potomac Rivers
